author: hwright
msg: Properly set a pointer, thereby eliminating some memory clobbering.
Followup to r32530.
* subversion/libsvn_subr/checksum.c
(svn_checksum_create): Set the digest pointer to the end of the checksum
structure, which is the start of the digest memory area.

author: hwright
msg: A few minor improvements and simplifications to the svn_checksum code.
Followup to r32524.
Suggested by: gstein
* subversion/libsvn_subr/checksum.c
(DIGESTSIZE, validate_kind): New.
(svn_checksum_create, svn_checksum_clear, svn_checksum_parse_hex,
svn_checksum_dup, svn_checksum): Refactor the size and validation
calculations using the new function and macro.

author: pburba
msg: Follow-up to r32527, fix the Windows build.conf
* build.conf
(libsvn_subr): Add new svn_checksum.h to msvc-export list.

author: gstein
msg: Fix a small typo in svn_checksum_match()
* subversion/libsvn_subr/checksum.c
(svn_checksum_match): test d2 for NULL-ness, rather than d1 twice.

author: hwright
msg: More merging from the fs-rep-sharing branch.  This time, merge bits of
the following revisions: r28976, r29040, r30035, r30651, r30784, r30788,
This converts libsvn_fs_base to use the svn_checksum_t data type where
applicable.
